synonyms.synonym: Ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex 11 kDa protein

protein.specific_function: This is a component of the ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex (complex III or cytochrome b-c1 complex), which is part of the mitochondrial respiratory chain. This protein may mediate formation of the complex between cytochromes c and c1

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
generation of precursor metabolites and energy
mitochondrial electron transport, ubiquinol to cytochrome c

reference.reference_text: Ohta S, Goto K, Arai H, Kagawa Y: An extremely acidic amino-terminal presequence of the precursor for the human mitochondrial hinge protein. FEBS Lett. 1987 Dec 21;226(1):171-5.
